problem_names: lemma PP_Pinp: "t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> PP t = instInp Pinp t"

lemma HBL1_inp:
"\<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<phi> = {} \<Longrightarrow> prv \<phi> \<Longrightarrow> prv (instInp Pinp \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)"
lemma encF_fmla[simp,intro!]: "\<And> f. f \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> encF f \<in> fmla"

lemma \<tau>J[simp]:
assumes "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "\<tau>J \<psi> \<in> ptrm 0"

lemma \<tau>J_fmla[simp]:
assumes "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "\<tau>J \<psi> \<in> fmla"

lemma FvarsT_\<tau>J[simp]:
assumes "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "Fvars (\<tau>J \<psi>) = {out}"

lemma \<phi>J[simp]:
assumes "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "\<phi>J \<psi> \<in> fmla"

lemma Fvars_\<phi>J[simp]:
assumes "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "Fvars (\<phi>J \<psi>) = {}"

lemma diagonalization:
assumes \<psi>[simp]: "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and [simp]: "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "prveqlPT (\<tau>J \<psi>) \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (\<tau>J \<psi>)\<rangle> \<and>
       prv (eqv (\<phi>J \<psi>) (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle>))"

lemma prv_eql_subst_trm3:
"x \<in> var \<Longrightarrow> \<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> t1 \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> t2 \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow>
prv (eql t1 t2) \<Longrightarrow> prv (subst \<phi> t1 x) \<Longrightarrow> prv (subst \<phi> t2 x)"

lemma Pinp[simp,intro!]: "Pinp \<in> fmla"
and Fvars_Pinp[simp]: "Fvars Pinp = {inp}"

lemma ReprF_combineWith_CapN:
assumes "\<phi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<phi> = {}"
shows "prveqlPT (instInp (encF N) \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>) \<langle>neg \<phi>\<rangle>"
translations: lemma PP_Pinp: "t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> PP t = instInp Pinp t"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> PP t = instInp Pinp t

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow>
    subst P t xx = subst (subst P (Var inp) xx) t inp
text \<open>A version of HBL1 that uses the @{term inp} variable:\<close>

lemma HBL1_inp:
"\<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<phi> = {} \<Longrightarrow> prv \<phi> \<Longrightarrow> prv (instInp Pinp \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}; prv \<phi>\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> prv (instInp Pinp \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars \<phi> = {}; prv \<phi>\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> prv (subst (subst P (Var inp) xx)
                            \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle> inp)

locale Jeroslow_Diagonalization =
Deduct_with_False_Disj_Rename
  var trm fmla Var FvarsT substT Fvars subst
  eql cnj imp all exi
  fls
  dsj
  num
  prv
+
Encode
  var trm fmla Var FvarsT substT Fvars subst
  num
  enc
for
var :: "'var set" and trm :: "'trm set" and fmla :: "'fmla set"
and Var FvarsT substT Fvars subst
and eql cnj imp all exi
and fls
and dsj
and num
and prv
and enc ("\<langle>_\<rangle>")
+
fixes F :: "('trm \<Rightarrow> 'trm) set"
  and encF :: "('trm \<Rightarrow> 'trm) \<Rightarrow> 'fmla"
  and N :: "'trm \<Rightarrow> 'trm"
  and ssap :: "'fmla \<Rightarrow> 'trm \<Rightarrow> 'trm"
assumes
\<comment> \<open>For the members @{term f} of @{term F}, we will only care about their action on numerals,
and we assume that they send numerals to numerals.\<close>
F[simp,intro!]: "\<And> f n. f \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> n \<in> num \<Longrightarrow> f n \<in> num"
and
encF[simp,intro!]: "\<And> f. f \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> encF f \<in> ptrm (Suc 0)"
and
N[simp,intro!]: "N \<in> F"
and
ssap[simp]: "\<And>\<phi>. \<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<phi> = {inp} \<Longrightarrow> ssap \<phi> \<in> F"
and
ReprF: "\<And>f n. f \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> n \<in> num \<Longrightarrow> prveqlPT (instInp (encF f) n) (f n)"
and
CapN: "\<And>\<phi>. \<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<phi> = {} \<Longrightarrow> N \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle> = \<langle>neg \<phi>\<rangle>"
and
CapSS: \<comment> \<open>We consider formulas @{term \<psi>} of one variable, called @{term inp}:\<close>
"\<And> \<psi> f. \<psi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> Fvars \<psi> = {inp} \<Longrightarrow> f \<in> F \<Longrightarrow>
    ssap \<psi> \<langle>encF f\<rangle> = \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (instInp (encF f) \<langle>encF f\<rangle>)\<rangle>"
begin
lemma encF_fmla[simp,intro!]: "\<And> f. f \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> encF f \<in> fmla"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>f. f \<in> F \<Longrightarrow> encF f \<in> fmla

lemma \<tau>J[simp]:
assumes "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "\<tau>J \<psi> \<in> ptrm 0"

proof (prove)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. encF (ssap \<psi>) \<in> ptrm (Suc 0)
 2. \<langle>encF (ssap \<psi>)\<rangle> \<in> trm
 3. FvarsT \<langle>encF (ssap \<psi>)\<rangle> = Variable ` {Suc 0..0}

lemma \<tau>J_fmla[simp]:
assumes "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "\<tau>J \<psi> \<in> fmla"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<tau>J \<psi> \<in> ptrm 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<tau>J \<psi> \<in> fmla

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<tau>J \<psi>
  \<in> {\<sigma> \<in> fmla.
         Fvars \<sigma> = Variable ` {0..0} \<and> prv (exu out \<sigma>)}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<tau>J \<psi> \<in> fmla

lemma FvarsT_\<tau>J[simp]:
assumes "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "Fvars (\<tau>J \<psi>) = {out}"

lemma \<phi>J[simp]:
assumes "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "\<phi>J \<psi> \<in> fmla"

lemma Fvars_\<phi>J[simp]:
assumes "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "Fvars (\<phi>J \<psi>) = {}"

lemma diagonalization:
assumes \<psi>[simp]: "\<psi> \<in> fmla" and [simp]: "Fvars \<psi> = {inp}"
shows "prveqlPT (\<tau>J \<psi>) \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (\<tau>J \<psi>)\<rangle> \<and>
       prv (eqv (\<phi>J \<psi>) (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle>))"

proof (state)
this:
  f \<equiv> ssap \<psi>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. prveqlPT (\<tau>J \<psi>)
     \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (\<tau>J \<psi>)\<rangle>
 2. prv (eqv (\<phi>J \<psi>)
          (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle>))

proof (state)
this:
  f \<in> F

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. prveqlPT (\<tau>J \<psi>)
     \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (\<tau>J \<psi>)\<rangle>
 2. prv (eqv (\<phi>J \<psi>)
          (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<psi> \<in> fmla
  Fvars \<psi> = {inp}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. f \<langle>encF f\<rangle> =
    \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (\<tau>J \<psi>)\<rangle>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<psi> \<in> fmla
  Fvars \<psi> = {inp}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ssap \<psi> \<langle>encF (ssap \<psi>)\<rangle> =
    \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0
              (instInp (encF (ssap \<psi>))
                \<langle>encF (ssap \<psi>)\<rangle>)\<rangle>

proof (state)
this:
  f \<langle>encF f\<rangle> =
  \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (\<tau>J \<psi>)\<rangle>

goal (2 subgoals):
 1. prveqlPT (\<tau>J \<psi>)
     \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (\<tau>J \<psi>)\<rangle>
 2. prv (eqv (\<phi>J \<psi>)
          (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<langle>encF f\<rangle> \<in> num \<Longrightarrow>
  prveqlPT (instInp (encF f) \<langle>encF f\<rangle>)
   (f \<langle>encF f\<rangle>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prveqlPT (\<tau>J \<psi>)
     \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (\<tau>J \<psi>)\<rangle>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<langle>encF f\<rangle> \<in> num \<Longrightarrow>
  prveqlPT (\<tau>J \<psi>) (f \<langle>encF f\<rangle>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prveqlPT (\<tau>J \<psi>) (f \<langle>encF f\<rangle>)

proof (state)
this:
  prveqlPT (\<tau>J \<psi>)
   \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (\<tau>J \<psi>)\<rangle>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (eqv (\<phi>J \<psi>)
          (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle>))

from prveqlPT_prv_instInp_eqv_instInpP[OF \<psi>, of "\<tau>J \<psi>", OF _ _ _ _ this,
           unfolded \<phi>J_def[symmetric]]

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>Fvars \<psi> \<subseteq> {inp}; \<tau>J \<psi> \<in> ptrm 0;
   \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle> \<in> trm;
   FvarsT \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle> = {}\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (eqv (\<phi>J \<psi>)
                          (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle>))

proof (state)
this:
  prv (eqv (\<phi>J \<psi>)
        (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle>))

goal:
No subgoals!

text \<open>We follow Jeroslow's pseudo-term-based development of the
Second Incompleteness Theorem and point out the location in the proof that
implicitly uses an unstated assumption: the fact that, for certain two provably
equivalent formulas @{term \<phi>} and @{term \<phi>'}, it is provable that
the provability of the encoding of @{term \<phi>'} implies
the provability of the encoding of @{term \<phi>}. \<close>

locale Jeroslow_Godel_Second =
Jeroslow_Diagonalization
  var trm fmla Var FvarsT substT Fvars subst
  eql cnj imp all exi
  fls
  dsj
  num
  prv
  enc
  F encF N ssap
+
HBL1
  var trm fmla Var FvarsT substT Fvars subst
  num
  eql cnj imp all exi
  prv prv
  enc
  P
for
var :: "'var set" and trm :: "'trm set" and fmla :: "'fmla set"
and Var FvarsT substT Fvars subst
and eql cnj imp all exi
and fls
and dsj
and num
and prv
and enc ("\<langle>_\<rangle>")
and P
and F encF N ssap
+
assumes
SHBL3: "\<And>\<tau>. \<tau> \<in> ptrm 0 \<Longrightarrow> prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 \<tau>) (instInp Pinp \<langle>instInpP Pinp 0 \<tau>\<rangle>))"
begin

definition jcons :: "'fmla" where
"jcons \<equiv> all xx (neg (cnj (instInp Pinp (Var xx))
                           (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInp (encF N) (Var (xx))))))"

lemma prv_eql_subst_trm3:
"x \<in> var \<Longrightarrow> \<phi> \<in> fmla \<Longrightarrow> t1 \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> t2 \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow>
prv (eql t1 t2) \<Longrightarrow> prv (subst \<phi> t1 x) \<Longrightarrow> prv (subst \<phi> t2 x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>x \<in> var; \<phi> \<in> fmla; t1 \<in> trm; t2 \<in> trm;
     prv (eql t1 t2); prv (subst \<phi> t1 x)\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> prv (subst \<phi> t2 x)

lemma Pinp[simp,intro!]: "Pinp \<in> fmla"
and Fvars_Pinp[simp]: "Fvars Pinp = {inp}"

lemma ReprF_combineWith_CapN:
assumes "\<phi> \<in> fmla" and "Fvars \<phi> = {}"
shows "prveqlPT (instInp (encF N) \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>) \<langle>neg \<phi>\<rangle>"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<phi> \<in> fmla
  Fvars \<phi> = {}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prveqlPT (instInp (encF N) \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)
     \<langle>neg \<phi>\<rangle>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<phi> \<in> fmla
  Fvars \<phi> = {}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prveqlPT (instInp (encF N) \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)
     (N \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (state)
this:
  prv jcons

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (state)
this:
  \<psi> \<equiv> instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (state)
this:
  \<tau> \<equiv> \<tau>J \<psi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (state)
this:
  \<phi> \<equiv> \<phi>J \<psi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N) \<in> fmla &&&
    Fvars (instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)) = {inp}

proof (state)
this:
  \<psi> \<in> fmla
  Fvars \<psi> = {inp}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<tau>J \<psi> \<in> ptrm 0 &&&
    \<tau>J \<psi> \<in> fmla &&& Fvars (\<tau>J \<psi>) = {out}

proof (state)
this:
  \<tau> \<in> ptrm 0
  \<tau> \<in> fmla
  Fvars \<tau> = {out}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (state)
this:
  \<phi> \<in> fmla
  Fvars \<phi> = {}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (state)
this:
  eN\<tau> \<equiv> instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau> \<in> ptrm 0 &&&
    instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau> \<in> fmla &&&
    Fvars (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>) = {out}

proof (state)
this:
  eN\<tau> \<in> ptrm 0
  eN\<tau> \<in> fmla
  Fvars eN\<tau> = {out}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (state)
this:
  \<phi>' \<equiv> instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau> \<in> fmla &&&
    Fvars (instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>) = {}

proof (state)
this:
  \<phi>' \<in> fmla
  Fvars \<phi>' = {}

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (imp \<phi> \<phi>') &&&
    prv (imp \<phi>' \<phi>) &&& prv (eqv \<phi> \<phi>')

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (imp (instInpP \<psi> 0 \<tau>)
          (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>))) &&&
    prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>))
          (instInpP \<psi> 0 \<tau>)) &&&
    prv (eqv (instInpP \<psi> 0 \<tau>)
          (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>)))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (imp (instInpP (instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)) 0 \<tau>)
          (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>))) &&&
    prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>))
          (instInpP (instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)) 0 \<tau>)) &&&
    prv (eqv (instInpP (instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)) 0 \<tau>)
          (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>)))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>Pinp \<in> fmla; Fvars Pinp = {inp}; encF N \<in> ptrm (Suc 0);
   \<tau> \<in> ptrm 0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (imp (instInpP (instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)) 0
                               \<tau>)
                          (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>)))
  \<lbrakk>Pinp \<in> fmla; Fvars Pinp = {inp}; encF N \<in> ptrm (Suc 0);
   \<tau> \<in> ptrm 0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>))
                          (instInpP (instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)) 0
                            \<tau>))
  \<lbrakk>Pinp \<in> fmla; Fvars Pinp = {inp}; encF N \<in> ptrm (Suc 0);
   \<tau> \<in> ptrm 0\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (eqv (instInpP (instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)) 0
                               \<tau>)
                          (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (imp (instInpP (instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)) 0 \<tau>)
          (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>))) &&&
    prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>))
          (instInpP (instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)) 0 \<tau>)) &&&
    prv (eqv (instInpP (instInpP Pinp (Suc 0) (encF N)) 0 \<tau>)
          (instInpP Pinp 0 (instInpP (encF N) 0 \<tau>)))

proof (state)
this:
  prv (imp \<phi> \<phi>')
  prv (imp \<phi>' \<phi>)
  prv (eqv \<phi> \<phi>')

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
using this:
  prveqlPT (\<tau>J \<psi>)
   \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 (\<tau>J \<psi>)\<rangle> \<and>
  prv (eqv (\<phi>J \<psi>)
        (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>J \<psi>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prveqlPT \<tau> \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 \<tau>\<rangle> &&&
    prv (eqv \<phi> (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  prveqlPT \<tau> \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 \<tau>\<rangle> \<and>
  prv (eqv \<phi> (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prveqlPT \<tau> \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 \<tau>\<rangle> &&&
    prv (eqv \<phi> (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (state)
this:
  prveqlPT \<tau> \<langle>instInpP \<psi> 0 \<tau>\<rangle>
  prv (eqv \<phi> (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla;
   instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle> \<in> fmla\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (imp \<phi>
                          (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))
  \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla;
   instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle> \<in> fmla\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (imp (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)
                          \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (imp \<phi> (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>)) &&&
    prv (imp (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)

proof (state)
this:
  prv (imp \<phi> (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))
  prv (imp (instInp \<psi> \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (chain)
picking this:
  prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>)
        (instInp Pinp \<langle>instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>\<rangle>))
have "prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>) (instInp Pinp \<langle>instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>\<rangle>))"

proof (prove)
using this:
  prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>)
        (instInp Pinp \<langle>instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>)
          (instInp Pinp \<langle>instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>\<rangle>))

proof (state)
this:
  prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>)
        (instInp Pinp \<langle>instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (prove)
using this:
  prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>)
        (instInp Pinp \<langle>instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (imp \<phi>' (instInp Pinp \<langle>\<phi>'\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>)
        (instInp Pinp \<langle>instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (imp (instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>)
          (instInp Pinp \<langle>instInpP Pinp 0 eN\<tau>\<rangle>))

proof (state)
this:
  prv (imp \<phi>' (instInp Pinp \<langle>\<phi>'\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv jcons \<Longrightarrow> False

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; \<phi>' \<in> fmla;
   instInp Pinp \<langle>\<phi>'\<rangle> \<in> fmla\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (imp \<phi>
                          (instInp Pinp \<langle>\<phi>'\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>\<phi> \<in> fmla; \<phi>' \<in> fmla;
   instInp Pinp \<langle>\<phi>'\<rangle> \<in> fmla\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (imp \<phi>
